entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:38 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
